verses.text: \w My|strong="H1732"\w* heart \w is|strong="H1732"\w* steadfast, God. I \w will|strong="H7892"\w* \w sing|strong="H7892"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* I \w will|strong="H7892"\w* make \w music|strong="H7892"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* soul.
Wake up, harp \w and|strong="H3820"\w* lyre! \w I|strong="H3559"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* wake up \w the|strong="H3559"\w* dawn.

\w I|strong="H5782"\w* will give thanks \w to|strong="H7837"\w* you, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, amongst \w the|strong="H5782"\w* nations. \w I|strong="H5782"\w* will sing praises \w to|strong="H7837"\w* you amongst \w the|strong="H5782"\w* peoples.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* loving kindness \w is|strong="H3068"\w* great above \w the|strong="H3068"\w* heavens. \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* faithfulness reaches \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* skies.

\w Be|strong="H8064"\w* exalted, \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*! Let \w your|strong="H5921"\w* glory \w be|strong="H8064"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w That|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* beloved \w may|strong="H3519"\w* \w be|strong="H8064"\w* delivered, save \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* right hand, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* answer \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.

God \w has|strong="H3225"\w* spoken \w from|strong="H3225"\w* \w his|strong="H6030"\w* sanctuary: “\w In|strong="H6030"\w* triumph, I \w will|strong="H3225"\w* divide Shechem, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* measure \w out|strong="H2502"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3225"\w* Succoth.

Gilead \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w mine|strong="H1696"\w*. Manasseh \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w mine|strong="H1696"\w*. Ephraim \w also|strong="H7927"\w* \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* helmet. Judah \w is|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* sceptre.
Moab \w is|strong="H7218"\w* my wash pot. I \w will|strong="H3063"\w* toss my sandal \w on|strong="H7218"\w* Edom. I \w will|strong="H3063"\w* shout \w over|strong="H7218"\w* Philistia.”

Who \w will|strong="H4124"\w* bring \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fortified city? Who \w will|strong="H4124"\w* lead \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Edom?
Haven’t \w you|strong="H5704"\w* rejected us, \w God|strong="H4310"\w*? \w You|strong="H5704"\w* don’t go \w out|strong="H5704"\w*, \w God|strong="H4310"\w*, \w with|strong="H5892"\w* our armies.
Give \w us|strong="H2186"\w* help against \w the|strong="H3318"\w* enemy, \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* help \w of|strong="H6635"\w* man \w is|strong="H6635"\w* vain.

Through God, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H6862"\w* do valiantly, \w for|strong="H8668"\w* it is he \w who|strong="H6862"\w* \w will|strong="H6862"\w* tread down our \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*.
